Description.Text: All Suites have decorated ceilings and marble bathrooms and have Bathrobes, slippers, bath sheets, Frette bed linen and luxury Hermes bathroom amenities, Telephone, Safe, Fireplace. Jacuzzi, Massage Room.
Important place or monument close to the hotel: 6km from Chios city centre. Located on Kambos traditional village. Nearest airport: Chios airport - 4km. Chios port - 6km.
